LanguageData.glwwinduptimejumper: Length of warm-up sequence in hours for GravJumpers
LanguageData.glwlaunchwindowjumper: Length of gravlaunch window in hours for GravJumpers
LanguageData.glwwindowcooldownjumper: Length of post-launch window cooldown in hours for GravJumpers
LanguageData.glwwinduptime: Length of warm-up sequence in hours for GravShips
LanguageData.glwlaunchwindow: Length of gravlaunch window in hours for GravShips
LanguageData.glwwindowcooldown: Length of post-launch window cooldown in hours for GravShips
LanguageData.glwwinduptimehulk: Length of warm-up sequence in hours for GravHulks
LanguageData.glwlaunchwindowhulk: Length of gravlaunch window in hours for GravHulks
LanguageData.glwwindowcooldownhulk: Length of post-launch window cooldown in hours for GravHulks
LanguageData.glwsendLetters: Send letters when warm-up sequence finishes or when launch window closes
LanguageData.glwshowAlerts: Show alerts for warm-up sequence and launch window
